events.title: I-Spy Trail
events.html:
Alison Smith will be organising another I-Spy trail for the Christmas holidays - allowing primary aged children to follow a series of clues around Sonning Common in the search for a book title.
Click here to download the clues.

events.title: ZooLab
events.html:
By popular request Zoolab will be visiting the Library again. The theme this time will be “Zola the kind hearted Elf” - a Christmas workshop in which children are taken on a journey around the world delivering presents and encountering magical animals along the way.

Tickets are priced at £5 and will be on sale in November. Zoolab is suitable for children aged 5-11

events.title: Christmas Celebration
events.html: Do come and join us in the Library on Wednesday 22nd December from 2.30 pm.
